attributes.action: No cost to Freeview users from  proposed G4 masts installion
attributes.additional_details:
The proposed sale of licences by HMG for G4 transmitting signals rights in UK will pollute the free view signal in some areas of UK, the cost of providing filters should be meet by the polluters or the companies who are to profit inc the Government not the free view views.
NO Fees TO view Free view programmes.
